name: Arlan

attack.name: Lightning Rush
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Shackle Breaker
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Consumes Arlan's HP equal to 15% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to 120% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

ultimate.name: Frenzied Punishment
ultimate.description:
[Blast] | Energy Cost: 110
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 192% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 96% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

talent.name: Pain and Anger
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of 36% more DMG.

technique.name: Swift Harvest
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

traces.name: Revival
traces.description: If the current HP percentage is 30% or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to 20% of Max HP.

traces.name: Endurance
traces.description: The chance to resist DoT Debuffs increases by 50%.

traces.name: Repel
traces.description: Upon entering battle, if Arlan's HP is less than or equal to 50%, he can nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after he is attacked.
ATK +4%

e1.name: To the Bitter End
e1.description: When HP is lower than or equal to 50% of Max HP, increases Skill's DMG by 10%.

e2.name: Breaking Free
e2.description: Using Skill or Ultimate removes 1 debuff from oneself.

e3.name: Power Through
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Turn the Tables
e4.description: When struck by a killing blow after entering battle, instead of becoming knocked down, Arlan immediately restores his HP to 25% of his Max HP. This effect is automatically removed after it is triggered once or after 2 turn(s) have elapsed.

e5.name: Hammer and Tongs
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Self-Sacrifice
e6.description: When HP drops to 50% or below, Ultimate deals 20% more DMG. The DMG multiplier of DMG taken by the target enemy now applies to adjacent enemies as well.

materials.bossMat: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

description: The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department. This quiet boy hopes to protect the researchers who value their pursuit of knowledge, and to help them to complete their work.

name: Asta

attack.name: Spectrum Beam
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Meteor Storm
skill.description:
[Bounce]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 25% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to 25% of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

ultimate.name: Astral Blessing
ultimate.description:
[Support] | Energy Cost: 120
Increases SPD of all allies by 36 for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Astrometry
talent.description:
[Support]
Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness.
For every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by 7%, up to 5 time(s).
Starting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by 3 at the beginning of every turn.

technique.name: Miracle Flash
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Asta's ATK to all enemies.

traces.name: Sparks
traces.description:
Asta's Basic ATK has a 80% base chance to Burn enemies for 3 turn(s).
Burned enemies take Fire DoT equal to 50% of DMG dealt by Asta's Basic ATK at the start of each turn.

traces.name: Ignite
traces.description: When Asta is on the field, all allies' Fire DMG increases by 18%.

traces.name: Constellation
traces.description: Asta's DEF increases by 6% for every current Charging stack she possesses.
Fire DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Star Sings Sans Verses or Vocals
e1.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

e2.name: Moon Speaks in Wax and Wane
e2.description: After using her Ultimate, Asta's Charging stacks will not be reduced in the next turn.

e3.name: Meteor Showers for Wish and Want
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Aurora Basks in Beauty and Bliss
e4.description: Asta's Energy Regeneration Rate increases by 15% when she has 2 or more Charging stacks.

e5.name: Nebula Secludes in Runes and Riddles
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Galaxy Dreams in Calm and Comfort
e6.description: Charging stack(s) lost in each turn is reduced by 1.

description: The lead researcher of Herta Space Station and a lady from a renowned family. She's an astronomer overflowing with curiosity, and excels at managing the disparate staff of the space station.

name: Bailu

attack.name: Diagnostic Kick
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Singing Among Clouds
skill.description:
[Restore]
Heals a single ally for 7.8% of Bailu's Max HP plus 78.75. Bailu then heals random allies 2 time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by 15%.

ultimate.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
ultimate.description:
[Restore] | Energy Cost: 100
Heals all allies for 9% of Bailu's Max HP plus 90. Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn. The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

talent.name: Gourdful of Elixir
talent.description:
[Restore]
After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for 3.6% of Bailu's Max HP plus 36. This effect can trigger 2 time(s). When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for 12% of Bailu's Max HP plus 120 HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

technique.name: Saunter in the Rain
technique.description:
[Support]
After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Qihuang Analects
traces.description: When Bailu heals a target ally above their normal Max HP, the target's Max HP increases by 10% for 2 turns.

traces.name: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines
traces.description: Invigoration can trigger 1 more time(s).

traces.name: Aquatic Benediction
traces.description: Characters with Invigoration receive 10% less DMG.
HP +4%
HP +8%

e1.name: Ambrosial Aqua
e1.description: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.

e2.name: Sylphic Slumber
e2.description: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

e3.name: Omniscient Opulence
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Evil Excision
e4.description: Every healing provided by the Skill makes the recipient deal 10% more DMG for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

e5.name: Waning Worries
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity
e6.description: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.

materials.bossMat: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

description: The High Elder of the Vidyadhara, who is also known as the "Healer Lady" on the Luofu. She uses her unique medical treatment that can only be provided by the Vidyadhara dragon race to save lives.

name: Bronya

attack.name: Windrider Bullet
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Wind DMG equal to 50% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Combat Redeployment
skill.description:
[Support]
Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by 33% for 1 turn(s).
When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

ultimate.name: The Belobog March
ultimate.description:
[Support] | Energy Cost: 120
Increases the ATK of all allies by 33%, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to 12% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus 12% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Leading the Way
talent.description:
[Enhance]
After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by 15%.

technique.name: Banner of Command

[Support]
After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Command
traces.description: The CRIT Rate for Basic ATK increases to 100%.

traces.name: Battlefield
traces.description: At the start of the battle, all allies' DEF increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Military Might
traces.description: When Bronya is on the field, all allies deal 10% more DMG.
Wind DMG +3.2%

e1.description: When using Skill, there is 50% fixed chance of recovering 1 Skill Point. This effect has a 1-turn cooldown.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e5.name: Unstoppable
e5.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.description: The duration of the DMG Boost effect placed by the Skill on the target ally increases by 1 turn(s).

description: Heir apparent to the Supreme Guardian of Belobog. She possesses pride befitting of a princess, but also the determination and integrity of a soldier.

name: Clara

attack.name: I Want to Help
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skill.description:
[AoE]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter.
All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

ultimate.name: Promise, Not Command
ultimate.description:
[Enhance] | Energy Cost: 110
After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra 15%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s).
In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by 96%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect 2 time(s).

talent.description:
[Single Target]
Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by 10%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of Clara's ATK.

technique.name: A Small Price for Victory
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, the chance Clara will be attacked by enemies increases for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Kinship
traces.description: When attacked, this character has a 35% fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

traces.name: Under Protection
traces.description: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Revenge
traces.description: Increases Svarog's Counter DMG by 30%.
ATK +4%

e1.name: A Tall Figure
e1.description: Using Skill will not remove Marks of Counter on the enemy.

e2.name: A Tight Embrace
e2.description: After using Ultimate, ATK increases by 30% for 2 turn(s).

e3.name: Cold Steel Armor
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.description: After Clara is hit, the DMG taken by Clara is reduced by 30%. This effect lasts until the start of her next turn.

e5.name: A Small Promise
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Long Company
e6.description: After other allies are hit, Svarog also has a 50% fixed chance to trigger a Counter on the attacker and mark them with a Mark of Counter. When using Ultimate, the number of Enhanced Counters increases by 1.

description: A vagrant girl who lives with robots. She is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart. She wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.

[Single Target]

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.description: When Dan Heng uses his Ultimate to defeat an enemy, he will immediately take action again.

e5.name: A Drop of Rain Feeds a Torrent
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

[Defense]

[Blast]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 100% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to 40% of Himeko's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

ultimate.description:

Deals Fire DMG equal to 138% of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates 5 extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max 3 points).
If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to 70% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points.

description: The one who repaired the Astral Express. To witness the vast starry sky, she decided to travel with the Astral Express. Her hobby is brewing hand-made coffee.

attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

[Single Target]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 120% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Burn for 2 turn(s).

When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

traces.description: Ice DMG +3.2%

While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by 36%, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!" The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

A Belobog mechanic who used to be a researcher for the Technology Division of the Architects.
As Gepard Landau's elder sister, her personality stands in stark contrast to her brother's.
She loves an ancient form of music known as "rock 'n' roll" that was popular before the Eternal Freeze.

subTraces.description: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by 5% of their Max HP.

traces.name: Action Beats Overthinking
traces.description: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases their ATK by 15% and regenerates 5 Energy until the action is over.
HP +4%

e1.name: Earth-Shaking Resonance
e1.description: When the Trailblazer uses their Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 25% of the Trailblazer's DEF. When the Trailblazer uses their enhanced Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of the Trailblazer's DEF.

e2.name: Time-Defying Tenacity
e2.description: The Shield applied to all allies from the Trailblazer's Talent will block extra DMG equal to 2% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 27.

e3.name: Trail-Blazing Blueprint
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Nation-Building Oath
e4.description: At the start of the battle, immediately gains 4 stack(s) of Magma Will.

e5.name: Spirit-Warming Flame
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: City-Forging Bulwarks
e6.description: After the Trailblazer use enhanced Basic ATK or Ultimate, their DEF increases by 10%. Stacks up to 3 time(s).

description: A person who boarded the Astral Express. They chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

voiceActors.jp: Junya Enoki (榎木 淳弥) / Yui Ishikawa (石川 由依)

name: Welt

attack.name: Gravity Suppression
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.description:
[Bounce]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 36% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 36% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a 65% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 120
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 32% and SPD reduced by 10%.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.description:
[Enhance]
When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to 30% of his ATK to the enemy.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by 50%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 20% and SPD reduced by 10%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

traces.name: Retribution
traces.description: When using Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to increase the DMG received by the targets by 12% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Judgment
traces.description: Using Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

traces.name: Punishment
traces.description: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Legacy of Honor
e1.description: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next 2 time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals Additional DMG to the target equal to 50% of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or 80% of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

e2.name: Conflux of Stars
e2.description: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates 3 Energy.

e3.name: Prayer of Peace
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Appellation of Justice
e4.description: Base chance for Skill to inflict SPD Reduction increases by 35%.

e5.name: Power of Kindness
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Prospect of Glory
e6.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: A seasoned member of the Express crew. The passion buried in his heart burns anew as he enjoys this fresh adventure. Occasionally, he would sketch the experiences in a notebook.

name: Yanqing

attack.name: Frost Thorn
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 120% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Darting Ironthorn
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 110% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

ultimate.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 140
Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30%. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 210% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: One With the Sword
talent.description:
[Single Target]
When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15% and his CRIT DMG increases by 15%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.
The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 25% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

technique.name: The One True Sword
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals 30% more DMG for 2 turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is 50% or higher.

traces.name: Icing on the Kick
traces.description: When Yanqing attacks, deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 30% of Yanqing's ATK to enemies with Ice Weakness

traces.name: Frost Favors the Brave
traces.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Effect RES increases by 20%.

traces.name: Gentle Blade
traces.description: When a CRIT Hit is triggered, increases SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).
ATK +4%
HP +4%
ATK +6%

e1.name: Svelte Saber
e1.description: When Yanqing attacks a Frozen enemy, he deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 60% of his ATK.

e2.name: Supine Serenade
e2.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Energy Regeneration Rate increases by an extra 10%.

e3.name: Sword Savant
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Searing Sting
e4.description: When the current HP percentage is 80% or higher, Ice RES PEN increases by 12%.

e5.name: Surging Strife
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Swift Swoop
e6.description: If the Ultimate's buffs are still in effect when an enemy is defeated, their duration is extended by 1 turn.

description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age. No one can best Yanqing when he holds a sword in hand.

name: Seele

attack.name: Thwack
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Sheathed Blade
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 110% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

ultimate.name: Butterfly Flurry
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 120
Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 255% of her ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Resurgence
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

technique.name: Phantom Illusion
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

traces.name: Nightshade
traces.description: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Lacerate
traces.description: While Seele is in the buffed state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%.

traces.name: Rippling Waves
traces.description: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action will be Advanced Forward by 20%.
ATK +4%
DEF +5%
ATK +6%

e1.name: Extirpating Slash
e1.description: When dealing DMG to an enemy whose HP percentage is 80% or lower, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

e2.name: Dancing Butterfly
e2.description: The SPD Boost effect of Seele's Skill can stack up to 2 time(s).

e3.name: Dazzling Tumult
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Flitting Phantasm
e4.description: Seele regenerates 15 Energy when she defeats an enemy.

e5.name: Piercing Shards
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Shattering Shambles
e6.description:
After Seele uses her Ultimate, inflict the target enemy with Butterfly Flurry for 1 turn(s). Enemies suffering from Butterfly Flurry will take Additional Quantum DMG equal to 15% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the target enemy is defeated by the Butterfly Flurry DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.
When Seele is knocked down, the Butterfly Flurry inflicted on the enemies will be removed.

description: A resident of the Underworld and the backbone of Wildfire. She goes by the alias "Babochka." She has a frank personality, but there is a delicate and sensitive hidden side to her deep in her heart.

name: Jing Yuan

attack.name: Glistening Light
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Rifting Zenith
skill.description:
[AoE]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

ultimate.name: Lightbringer
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 130
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

talent.name: Prana Extirpated
talent.description:
[Bounce]
Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 33% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.
The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.
When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.
When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

technique.name: Spirit Invocation
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3 at the start of the next battle.

traces.name: Battalia Crush
traces.description: If the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action is greater or equal to 6 in the next turn, its CRIT DMG increases by 25% for the next turn.

traces.name: Savant Providence
traces.description: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: War Marshal
traces.description: After Skill is used, CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 2 turn(s).
ATK +4%
ATK +8%

e1.name: Slash, Seas Split
e1.description: When Lightning-Lord attacks, the DMG multiplier on enemies adjacent to the target enemy increases by an extra amount equal to 25% of the DMG multiplier against the target enemy.

e2.name: Swing, Skies Squashed
e2.description: After Lightning-Lord takes action, DMG caused by Jing Yuan's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

e3.name: Strike, Suns Subdued
e3.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Spin, Stars Sieged
e4.description: For each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action, Jing Yuan regenerates 2 Energy.

e5.name: Stride, Spoils Seized
e5.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Sweep, Souls Slain
e6.description:
Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable.
While Vulnerable, enemies receive 12% more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to 3 time(s).

description:
The Divine Foresight, one of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance, leads the Cloud Knights of the Xianzhou Luofu.
A student of the Luofu's previous Sword Champion, though not known for his martial prowess.

name: Silver Wolf

attack.name: System Warning
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Allow Changes?
skill.description:
[Impair]
There is a 75% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field ally's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered.
Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept.
In addition, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy further by 7.50% for 2 turn(s).
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 98% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

ultimate.name: User Banned
ultimate.description:
[Impair] | Energy Cost: 110
There's a 85% base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by 36% for 3 turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to 228% of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.

talent.name: Awaiting System Response...
talent.description:
[Impair]
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by 5%, reduce DEF by 4%, and reduce SPD by 3%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a 60% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for 3 turn(s) in the enemy target.

technique.name: Force Quit Program
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

traces.name: Generate
traces.description: Bug's duration is extended for 1 turn(s). Every time an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Silver Wolf has a 65% base chance of implanting a random Bug in the enemy.

traces.name: Inject
traces.description: The duration of the Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf's Skill increases by 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Side Note
traces.description: If there are 3 or more debuff(s) affecting the enemy when the Skill is used, then the Skill decreases the enemy's All-Type RES by an additional 3%.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Social Engineering
e1.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, Silver Wolf regenerates 7 Energy for every debuff that the target enemy currently has. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) in each use of her Ultimate.

e2.name: Zombie Network
e2.description: When an enemy enters battle, reduces their Effect RES by 20%.

e3.name: Payload
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Bounce Attack
e4.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, deals Additional Quantum DMG equal to 20% of Silver Wolf's ATK for every debuff currently on the enemy target. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 5 time(s) during each use of her Ultimate.

e5.name: Brute Force Attack
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Overlay Network
e6.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by Silver Wolf increases by 20%, up to a limit of 100%.

description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a genius hacker. She sees the universe as a massive immersive simulation game and has fun with it. She's mastered the skill known as "aether editing," which can be used to tamper with the data of reality.

name: Luocha

attack.name: Thorns of the Abyss
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skill.description:
[Restore]
After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to 40% of Luocha's ATK plus 200. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
When any ally's HP percentage drops to 50% or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Death Wish
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 100
Removes 1 buff(s) from all enemies and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

talent.name: Cycle of Life
talent.description:
[Restore]
When Abyss Flower reaches 2 stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.
When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to 12% of Luocha's ATK plus 60.
The Field's effect lasts for 2 turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

technique.name: Mercy of a Fool
technique.description:
[Restore]
After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.

traces.name: Cleansing Revival
traces.description: When the Skill's effect is triggered, removes 1 debuff(s) from a target ally.

traces.name: Sanctified
traces.description: When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, all allies (except the attacker) restore HP equal to 7% of Luocha's ATK plus 93.

traces.name: Through the Valley
traces.description: The chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs increases by 70%.
ATK +4%
ATK +8%

e1.name: Ablution of the Quick
e1.description: While the Field is active, ATK of all allies increases by 20%.

e2.name: Bestowal From the Pure
e2.description: When his Skill is triggered, if the target ally's HP is lower than 50%, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by 30%. If the target ally's HP is at 50% or higher, the ally receives a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of Luocha's ATK plus 240, lasting for 2 turns.

e3.name: Surveyal by the Fool
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Heavy Lies the Crown
e4.description: When Luocha's Field is active, enemies become Weakened and deal 12% less DMG.

e5.name: Cicatrix 'Neath the Pain
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Reunion With the Dust
e6.description: When Ultimate is used, there is a 100% fixed chance to reduce all enemies' All-Type RES by 20% for 2 turn(s).

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas. Has excellent medical skills.

name: Yukong

attack.name: Arrowslinger
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Emboldening Salvo
skill.description:
[Support]
Obtains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by 40%, and every time an ally's turn ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings."
When it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.

ultimate.name: Diving Kestrel
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 130
If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by 21% and CRIT DMG by 39%. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 228% of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Basic ATK additionally deals Imaginary DMG equal to 40% of Yukong's ATK, and increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by 100%. This effect can be triggered again in 1 turn(s).

technique.name: Chasing the Wind
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for 20 seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by 35%, and Yukong gains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.

traces.name: Archerion
traces.description: Yukong can resist 1 debuff application for 1 time. This effect can be triggered again in 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Bowmaster
traces.description: When Yukong is on the field, Imaginary DMG dealt by all allies increases by 12%.

traces.name: Majestas
traces.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong regenerates 2 additional Energy every time an ally takes action.
Imaginary DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Aerial Marshal
e1.description: At the start of battle, increases the SPD of all allies by 10% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: Skyward Command
e2.description: When any ally's current energy is equal to its energy limit, Yukong regenerates an additional 5 energy. This effect can only be triggered once for each ally. The trigger count is reset after Yukong casts her Ultimate.

e3.name: Torrential Fusillade
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Zephyrean Echoes
e4.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong deals 30% more DMG to enemies.

e5.name: August Deadshot
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Bowstring Thunderclap
e6.description: When Yukong uses her Ultimate, she immediately gains 1 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings."

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot. Since heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.
